page.title: 13HOBBIES AND CLUBS .
page.content: There are activities for young people in the form of Brownies, Guides Scouts, Rangers and Youth Club.For the more mature resident there is a Leisure Club and a Senior Citizens room at the Community Centre. Specialist activities are covered by the Historical Society,Twinning Assn. (Cormelle Le Royal, Normandy), Conservation Group, Publicity Assn. Peace Group, Art and Craft Clubs, Cancer Research, the R.A.O.B.and the Guild of Bell Ringers.Indoor Sports include Aikido, Boxing,Table Tennis, Badminton, Weightlifting,Swimming and Sequence Dancing,Men and Women's Darts League, Pool and Skittles,are well supported. Outdoor Clubs include Bowls Cricket Football Sea Angling and Gardening.
